oai_dc:dc.dc:title: LONGSHORE BED-LOAD TRANSPORT
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Damgaard, Jesper S.
Soulsby, Richard L.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: lonshore transport
bedload
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An analytical formula for longshore bed-load sediment transport is derived. The derivation is based on sediment physics and the formula is therefore less dependent on calibration. The formula is compared to the CERC formula, a numerical model and field data.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Coastal Engineering Proceedings; No. 25 (1996): Proceedings of 25th Conference on Coastal Engineering, Orlando, Florida, 1996.
